data.quote: People aren't born ordinary but they choose to be ordinary
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Great dreams of great dreamers are always transcended
data.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: If you don't build your dream, someone else will hire you to help them build theirs.
data.author: Dhirubhai Ambani

data.quote: Our dreams have to be bigger. Our ambitions higher. Our commitment deeper. And our efforts greater.
data.author: Dhirubhai Ambani

data.quote: Do or do not. There is no try.
data.author: Yoda

data.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
data.author: Amelia Earhart

data.quote: What’s money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
data.author: Bob Dylan

data.quote: Certain things catch your eye, but pursue only those that capture the heart.
data.author: Ancient Indian Proverb

data.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: If you look at what you have in life, you’ll always have more. If you look at what you don’t have in life, you’ll never have enough.
data.author: Oprah Winfrey

data.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
data.author: Steven Covey

data.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
data.author: Will Rogers

data.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
data.author: Og Mandino

data.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: To see what is right and not do it is a lack of courage.
data.author: Confucious

data.quote: Today’s accomplishments were yesterday’s impossibilities.
data.author: Robert H. Schuller

data.quote: There are no limits to what you can accomplish, except the limits you place on your own thinking.
data.author: Brian Tracy

data.quote: Find the good. It's all around you. Find it. Showcase it, and you'll start believing in it.
data.author: Jesse Owens

data.quote: What you're thinking is what you're becoming.
data.author: Muhammad Ali

data.quote: You can't make decisions based on fear and the possibility of what might happen.
data.author: Michelle Obama

data.quote: I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear; knowing what must be done does away with fear
data.author: Rosa Parks

data.quote: The secret of life is to have no fear; it's the only ay to function.
data.author: Stokely Carmichael

data.quote: Magic lies in challenging what seems impossible.
data.author: Carol Moseley Braun

data.quote: I am lucky that whatever fear I have inside me, my desire to win is always stronger.
data.author: Serena Williams

data.quote: I got my start by giving myself a start.
data.author: Madame CJ Walker

data.quote: I used to want the words 'She tried' on my tombstone. Now I want 'She did it.'
data.author: Katherine Dunham

data.quote: Everything will change. The only question is growing up or decaying.
data.author: Nikki Giovanni

data.quote: What's the world for if you can't make it up the way you want it?
data.author: Toni Morrison

data.quote: The progress of the world will call for the best that all of us have to give.
data.author: Mary Mcleod Bethune

data.quote: If you are fortunate to have opportunity, it is your duty to make sure other people have those opportunities.
data.author: Kamala Harris

data.quote: A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives.
data.author: Jackie Robinson

data.quote: Never be limited by other people's limited imagination.
data.author: Dr. Mae Jamison

data.quote: You can be the lead in your own life.
data.author: Kerry Washington

data.quote: Power is not given to you. You have to take it.
data.author: Beyonce

data.quote: One important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation.
data.author: Arthur Ashe

data.quote: Even the silence has a story to tell you. Just listen. Listen.
data.author: Jacqueline Woodson

data.quote: In order to rise from its own ashes, a phoenix first must burn.
data.author: Octavia Butler
